subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea, the top team in England’s Premier League, extended its season-opening winning streak with a 2-0 home win over Stoke on goals by Florent Malouda and Didier Drogba, while Arsenal and Manchester United also posted victories.
snippet: Chelsea, the top team in England’s Premier League, extended its season-opening winning streak with a 2-0 home win over Stoke on goals by Florent Malouda and Didier Drogba, while Arsenal and Manchester United also posted victories.
